Alias.name: help me
Alias.script: send('crt Requesting assistance at '..gmcp.Room.Info.name..' in '..gmcp.Room.Info.area..'!')-- you wimp

Alias.name: my location
Alias.script: send("crt I'm at "..gmcp.Room.Info.name.." in "..gmcp.Room.Info.area..".")

Alias.name: xenoScan
Alias.script: send("xenozoology scan "..matches[2])

Alias.name: mcolors
Alias.script: wrap = 0 for i,v in pairs(color_table) do if string.find(i,'%u') == nil then fg(i) echo (i .. string.rep(" ",22-string.len(i))) resetFormat() if wrap == 5 then wrap = 0 echo("\n") else wrap = wrap + 1 end end end

Alias.name: ^wwr
Alias.script: sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') send ('wetwiring regenerate')

Alias.name: flight
Alias.script: local class = gmcp.Char.Status.class if class == 'Nanoseer' then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('void levitate'.. matches[2]) elseif class == 'Engineer' then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('operate hoverboard'.. matches[2]) elseif class == 'B.E.A.S.T.' then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('fire jumpjets'.. matches[2]) elseif class == 'Scoundrel' then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('fly'.. matches[2]) elseif class == 'Fury' then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('kith flight'.. matches[2]) end

Alias.name: runner
Alias.script: sym.hunter.runner[matches[2]]()

Alias.name: toggle
Alias.script: local hunting = sym.checkmodule('Hunting') sym.hunter.system[hunting and 'stop' or 'start']() sym.echo('Autohunting has been '..(hunting and 'disabled' or 'enabled')..'.')

Alias.name: set party size
Alias.script: sym.hunter.runner.config.party = tonumber(matches[2]) or #gmcp.Room.Players sym.echo('<0,128,128>Party Size: <128,128,0>' .. sym.hunter.runner.config.party .. '\n')

Alias.name: calling
Alias.script: local cancall = matches[2] if cancall == 'on' then sym.hunter.runner.config.calling = true sym.echo('Hunt calling: enabled') else sym.hunter.runner.config.calling = false sym.echo('Hunt calling: disabled') end

Alias.name: targetting
Alias.script: send('st '..matches[2]) if sym.hunter.runner.config.calling then send('crt Target: '..matches[2], false) end

Alias.name: interrupt2
Alias.script: local target = sym.target local bullets = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.bl) local class = gmcp.Char.Status.class if class == 'Nanoseer' then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('nano eyestrike ' .. target) elseif class == 'Engineer' then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('gadget shock ' .. target) elseif class == 'B.E.A.S.T.' then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') if tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.pl) > 50 then sym.hunter.send('plasma flash ' .. target) send('assess ' .. target) else sym.hunter.send('mwp netlaunch ' .. target) send('assess ' .. target) end elseif class == 'Scoundrel' then if bullets == 0 then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('guile pocketsand ' .. target) send('assess ' .. target) else sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('gun pointblank ' .. target) send('assess ' .. target) end elseif class == 'Fury' then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('kith fever ' .. target) end

Alias.name: wilderness list
launch ship
Alias.script: sym.space.boarded = true sendAll("ship launch", 'say activate all') expandAlias("shipart") enableTimer("ships")

Alias.name: dock ship
Alias.script: sym.space.boarded = false send("ship dock") disableTimer("ships") sym.ui.adj.right:hide() sym.ui.adj.left:hide()

Alias.name: cargoRecovery
Alias.script: sendAll('cargo recover n', 'cargo recover ne', 'cargo recover nw', 'cargo recover w', 'cargo recover sw', 'cargo recover s', 'cargo recover se', 'cargo recover e')

Alias.name: ship artifacts
Alias.script:
send("artifact link ship_anonymity here") send("artifact link ship_beacon_3 here") send("artifact link ship_improved_scoops here") send("artifact link ship_message_beacon here") send("artifact link ship_homewarp here") send("artifact link ship_free_voidgate here") send("artifact link ship_cargo_recover here") send("artifact link ship_hyperscan_1 here") send("artifact link ship_anonymity here") send("artifact link stationlink here") send("artifact link ship_illusion here") send("artifact link ship_weapon_falloff here") send("artifact link ship_weapon_range here") send("artifact link quantum_cargo_nets here") send('artifact link sector_scanner here') send("artifact link ship_voidgate_hopper here")
--do this smarter someday

Alias.name: autofire all
Alias.script: sendAll( 'ship target ' .. target, 'ship weapon autofire mcannons ' .. target, 'ship weapon autofire cannons ' .. target, 'ship weapon autofire lasers ' .. target, 'ship weapon autofire missiles ' .. target, 'ship weapon autofire slicer ' .. target, 'ship weapon autofire drainer ' .. target, 'ship weapon autofire interdict ' .. target )

Alias.name: shipfire all
Alias.script: local target = gmcp.Char.Status.target:match('%w+') sendAll( 'ship target ' .. target, 'ship weapon fire lasers ' .. target, 'ship weapon fire mcannons ' .. target, 'ship weapon fire cannons ' .. target, 'ship weapon fire missiles ' .. target, 'ship weapon fire slicer ' .. target, 'ship weapon fire drainer ' .. target, 'ship weapon fire tractor ' .. target, 'ship weapon fire interdict ' .. target )

Alias.name: manual web
Alias.script: send('ship weapon fire webs '..sym.target)

Alias.name: rl kinetic
Alias.script: sendAll( 'ship weapon ammo mcannons kinetic', 'ship weapon ammo cannons kinetic', 'ship weapon ammo missiles kinetic', 'say reloading Kinetic' )

Alias.name: rl thermal
Alias.script: sendAll('ship weapon ammo mcannons thermal', 'ship weapon ammo cannons thermal', 'ship weapon ammo missiles thermal', 'say reloading Thermal')

Alias.name: rl em
Alias.script: sendAll('ship weapon ammo mcannons em', 'ship weapon ammo cannons em', 'ship weapon ammo missiles em', 'say reloading EM')

Alias.name: rl gravitic
Alias.script: sendAll('ship weapon ammo mcannons gravitic', 'ship weapon ammo cannons gravitic', 'ship weapon ammo missiles gravitic', 'say reloading Gravtic')

Alias.name: beast muscular damage
Alias.script: local target = sym.target if sym.hunter.flags.channeling then if not sym.hunter.flags.support and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 75 then sym.hunter.send('suit support') elseif not sym.hunter.flags.dualshot then sym.hunter.send('mwp dualshot '..target) send('assess '..target) elseif sym.hunter.flags.dualshot and not sym.hunter.flags.combust then sym.hunter.send('plasma combust '..target) send('assess '..target) else send('railshot') send('assess ' ..target) end else sym.hunter.send('plasma sear '..target) sym.hunter.flags.channeling = false end

Alias.name: beast muscular delay
Alias.script: local target = sym.target if sym.hunter.flags.channeling then if not sym.hunter.flags.support and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 75 then sym.hunter.send('suit support') elseif not sym.hunter.flags.dualshot then sym.hunter.send('mwp dualshot ' .. target) send('assess ' .. target) elseif not sym.hunter.flags.routine and not sym.hunter.flags.airshot then sym.hunter.send('mwp airshot ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('suit routine ' .. target .. ' armvice legclamp boot') send('assess ' .. target) elseif not sym.hunter.flags.airshot then sym.hunter.send('mwp airshot ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('mwp hobble ' .. target) send('assess ' .. target) else sym.hunter.send('mwp hobble ' .. target) send('assess ' .. target) end else sym.hunter.send('plasma sear ' .. target) sym.hunter.flags.channeling = false end

Alias.name: beast burn rotation
Alias.script: local target = sym.target if sym.hunter.flags.channeling then if not sym.hunter.flags.support and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 75 then sym.hunter.send('suit support') elseif not sym.hunter.flags.dualshot then sym.hunter.send('mwp dualshot '..target) send('assess '..target) elseif sym.hunter.flags.dualshot and tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.pl) > 930 then sym.hunter.send('plasma douse '..target) send('assess '..target) elseif sym.hunter.flags.dualshot and tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.pl) < 900 then sym.hunter.send('plasma burn '..target) send('assess ' ..target) else send('legclamp') send('assess ' ..target) end else sym.hunter.send('plasma sear '..target) sym.hunter.flags.channeling = false end

Alias.name: musc sunder rush
Alias.script: local target = sym.target if sym.hunter.flags.channeling then if not sym.hunter.flags.support and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 75 then sym.hunter.send('suit support') elseif not sym.hunter.flags.dualshot then sym.hunter.send('mwp dualshot ' .. target) send('assess ' .. target) elseif not sym.hunter.flags.routine and sym.hunter.flags.overclock then sym.hunter.send('suit routine ' .. target .. ' pound pound pound') sym.hunter.send('suit overclock') sym.hunter.send('mwp hooknet ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('suit pound ' .. target) send('assess ' .. target) elseif not sym.hunter.flags.routine then sym.hunter.send('suit routine ' .. target .. ' armvice legclamp legclamp') elseif not sym.hunter.flags.airshot then sym.hunter.send('mwp airshot ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('suit armvice ' .. target) send('assess ' .. target) else sym.hunter.send('suit legclamp ' .. target) send('assess ' .. target) end else sym.hunter.send('plasma sear ' .. target) sym.hunter.flags.channeling = false end

Alias.name: mind
Alias.script: local target = sym.target local bullets = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.bl) if not sym.hunter.flags.stimmed and sym.haveskill('Stim', 'Guile') and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 78 and not sym.hunter.flags.channeling then sym.hunter.send('guile stim') elseif canmend then checkSystems() elseif bullets == 0 then if sym.haveskill('Fling', 'Improvisation') then if not sym.hunter.flags.meltered then sym.hunter.send('ied fling shrapnel melter at ' .. target) else sym.hunter.send('ied fling wiring distorter at ' .. target) end sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) if caneject == true then send("gun eject") end else sym.hunter.send('gun spin') end elseif bullets == 0 and sym.hunter.flags.channeling then sym.hunter.send('guile pocketsand ' .. target) sym.hunter.flags.channeling = false elseif not sym.hunter.flags.rapidfire and sym.haveskill('Rapidfire', 'Gunslinging') and bullets >= 2 then send("switch impairing random") sym.hunter.send('gun rapidfire ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) elseif not sym.hunter.flags.ambushed and sym.haveskill('Ambush', 'Gunslinging') then send("switch impairing random") sym.hunter.send('gun ambush ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) elseif sym.hunter.flags.rapidfire and bullets >= 1 then send("switch impairing random") sym.hunter.send('gun crackshot ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) else sym.hunter.send('gun pointblank ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) sym.hunter.flags.channeling = false end

Alias.name: internal
Alias.script:
local target = sym.target local bullets = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.bl) if not sym.hunter.flags.stimmed and sym.haveskill('Stim', 'Guile') and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 78 and windupcheck == 0 then sym.hunter.send('guile stim') elseif canmend then checkSystems() elseif bullets == 0 and windupcheck == 0 then send("switch weakening random") sym.hunter.send('ied fling shrapnel piercer at '..target) if caneject then send("gun eject") end
elseif bullets == 0 and windupcheck == 1 then send("switch weakening random") sym.hunter.send('guile pocketsand '..target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) windupcheck = 0
elseif not sym.hunter.flags.ambushed and sym.haveskill('Ambush', 'Gunslinging') then send("switch weakening random") sym.hunter.send('gun ambush '..target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target)
elseif not sym.hunter.flags.rapidfire and sym.haveskill('Rapidfire', 'Gunslinging') and bullets >= 2 then sym.hunter.send('gun rapidfire '..target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target)
elseif caneject and bullets > 3 then send('gun eject')
elseif bullets >= 1 then sym.hunter.send('gun crackshot '..target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target)
else sym.hunter.send('gun pointblank '..target) windupcheck = 0 end

Alias.name: sensory
Alias.script:
local target = sym.target local bullets = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.bl) if not sym.hunter.flags.stimmed and sym.haveskill('Stim', 'Guile') and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 78 and windupcheck == 0 then sym.hunter.send('guile stim') elseif canmend then checkSystems()
elseif bullets == 0 and windupcheck == 0 then if sym.haveskill('Fling', 'Improvisation') then if not sym.hunter.flags.meltered then sym.hunter.send('ied fling shrapnel melter at ' .. target) send('assess ' .. target) if caneject == true then send("gun eject") end else -- sym.hunter.send('gun spin') sym.hunter.send('ied fling shrapnel blinder at ' .. target) end end elseif bullets == 0 and windupcheck == 1 then sym.hunter.send('guile pocketsand ' .. target) windupcheck = 0 elseif not sym.hunter.flags.ambushed and sym.haveskill('Ambush', 'Gunslinging') then send("switch disrupting random") sym.hunter.send('gun ambush ' .. target) send('assess ' .. target) elseif not sym.hunter.flags.rapidfire and sym.haveskill('Rapidfire', 'Gunslinging') and bullets >= 2 and windupcheck == 0 then send("switch disrupting random") sym.hunter.send('gun rapidfire ' .. target) send('assess ' .. target) elseif sym.hunter.flags.rapidfire and bullets >= 1 and windupcheck == 0 then sym.hunter.send('guile haymaker ' .. target .. ' head') sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) if caneject == true then send("gun eject") end else sym.hunter.send('gun pointblank ' .. target) windupcheck = 0 end

Alias.name: damage2
Alias.script: local target = sym.target local bullets = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.bl) if windupcheck == 0 then if not sym.hunter.flags.stimmed and sym.haveskill('Stim', 'Guile') and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 75 then sym.hunter.send('guile stim') elseif canmend then checkSystems() elseif bullets == 0 then if sym.haveskill('Fling', 'Improvisation') then send("switch amplifying choking") sym.hunter.send('ied fling shrapnel ripper at ' .. target) if caneject == true and bullets > 3 then send("gun eject") end end elseif not sym.hunter.flags.rapidfire and sym.haveskill('Rapidfire', 'Gunslinging') and bullets >= 2 then sym.hunter.send('gun rapidfire ' .. target) else sym.hunter.send('gun crackshot ' .. target) if caneject == true and bullets > 3 then send("gun eject") end end else if bullets == 0 then sym.hunter.send('guile pocketsand ' .. target) windupcheck = 0 if caneject == true and bullets > 3 then send("gun eject") end else sym.hunter.send('gun pointblank ' .. target) windupcheck = 0 end end

Alias.name: piercer
Alias.script: send("trigger shrapnel piercer") send("multibomb shrapnel piercer")

Alias.name: trip bind
Alias.script:
local bullets = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.bl)
if bullets > 0 and not sym.hunter.flags.trip then send("guile trip") else sym.hunter.send('fling sleeper') end

Alias.name: haymaker
Alias.script: send('guile haymaker') send('assess ' .. target)

Alias.name: huntextend
Alias.script: local target = sym.target local bullets = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.bl) if windupcheck == 0 then if not sym.hunter.flags.stimmed and sym.haveskill('Stim', 'Guile') and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 71 then sym.hunter.send('guile stim') elseif canmend then checkSystems() elseif bullets == 0 then if sym.haveskill('Fling', 'Improvisation') then send("switch weakening random") sym.hunter.send('ied fling shrapnel ripper at ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) if caneject == true and bullets > 3 then send("gun eject") end end elseif not sym.hunter.flags.ambushed and sym.haveskill('Ambush', 'Gunslinging') then sym.hunter.send('gun ambush ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) if caneject == true and bullets > 3 then send("gun eject") end elseif not sym.hunter.flags.rapidfire and sym.haveskill('Rapidfire', 'Gunslinging') and bullets >= 2 then sym.hunter.send('gun rapidfire ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) if caneject == true and bullets > 3 then send("gun eject") end else -- sym.hunter.send('gun crackshot ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('guile haymaker ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) if caneject == true and bullets > 3 then send("gun eject") end end else if bullets == 0 then sym.hunter.send('guile pocketsand ' .. target) windupcheck = 0 if caneject == true and bullets > 3 then send("gun eject") end else sym.hunter.send('gun pointblank ' .. target) windupcheck = 0 end end

Alias.name: interrupt encroachment
Alias.script: local target = sym.target local bullets = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.bl) if bullets == 0 then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('guile pocketsand ' .. target) else sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') send('switch impairing encroachment') sym.hunter.send('gun pointblank ' .. target) end

Alias.name: facesmash
Alias.script: send('guile facesmash ' ..sym.target.. ' seat')

Alias.name: damage1
Alias.script: local target = sym.target local bullets = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.bl) if windupcheck == 0 then if not sym.hunter.flags.stimmed and sym.haveskill('Stim', 'Guile') and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 75 then sym.hunter.send('guile stim') elseif canmend then checkSystems() elseif bullets == 0 then if sym.haveskill('Fling', 'Improvisation') then sym.hunter.send('ied fling shrapnel melter at ' .. target) if caneject == true and bullets > 3 then send("gun eject") end end elseif not sym.hunter.flags.rapidfire and sym.haveskill('Rapidfire', 'Gunslinging') and bullets >= 2 then sym.hunter.send('gun rapidfire ' .. target) else sym.hunter.send('gun crackshot ' .. target) if caneject == true and bullets > 3 then send("gun eject") end end else if bullets == 0 then sym.hunter.send('guile pocketsand ' .. target) windupcheck = 0 if caneject == true and bullets > 3 then send("gun eject") end else sym.hunter.send('gun pointblank ' .. target) windupcheck = 0 end end

Alias.name: hinder
Alias.script:
local target = sym.target local bullets = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.bl) if not sym.hunter.flags.stimmed and sym.haveskill('Stim', 'Guile') and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 75 and windupcheck == 0 then sym.hunter.send('guile stim') elseif canmend then checkSystems() elseif bullets > 0 and not sym.hunter.flags.trip and not sym.hunter.flags.prone and not sym.hunter.flags.bind then send("guile trip") elseif bullets == 0 and not sym.hunter.flags.sleep and not sym.hunter.flags.prone and not sym.hunter.flags.bind then send("switch weakening staggering") sym.hunter.send('fling sleeper') elseif sym.hunter.flags.prone and not sym.hunter.flags.bind then sym.hunter.send('guile bind') elseif bullets == 0 and windupcheck == 0 then send("switch weakening staggering") --sym.hunter.send('ied fling wiring piercer at '..target) sym.hunter.send('gun spin')
elseif bullets == 0 and windupcheck == 1 then send("switch weakening staggering") sym.hunter.send('guile pocketsand '..target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) windupcheck = 0
elseif not sym.hunter.flags.ambushed and sym.haveskill('Ambush', 'Gunslinging') and windupcheck == 0 then sym.hunter.send('gun ambush '..target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target)
elseif not sym.hunter.flags.rapidfire and sym.haveskill('Rapidfire', 'Gunslinging') and bullets >= 2 and windupcheck == 0 then sym.hunter.send('gun rapidfire '..target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target)
elseif caneject and bullets > 3 then send('gun eject')
elseif bullets >= 1 and windupcheck == 0 then sym.hunter.send('gun crackshot '..target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target)
else sym.hunter.send('gun pointblank '..target) windupcheck = 0 end

Alias.name: heartbreaker route
Alias.script: local target = sym.target local sym_name = gmcp.Char.Name.name if not sym.hunter.flags.channeling then if not sym.hunter.flags.stimjected and not sym.hunter.flags.autoheal and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 75 then sym.hunter.send('stimjector ' .. sym_name) elseif not sym.hunter.flags.stimjected and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 55 then sym.hunter.send('stimjector ' .. sym_name) sym.hunter.flags.autoheal = false elseif not sym.hunter.flags.turretpower then sym.hunter.send('turret qpcboost') elseif tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.pt) < 36 and not sym.hunter.flags.airdrop then send('airdrop') elseif not sym.hunter.flags.gaussfield then sym.hunter.send('operate gaussfield') sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) elseif not sym.hunter.flags.repeated then sym.hunter.send('bot repeat disrupt ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) elseif not sym.hunter.flags.worming then sym.hunter.send('bot worm ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) elseif not sym.hunter.flags.gaussify and not sym.hunter.flags.degauss then sym.hunter.send('operate degauss '..target..' taser') sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) elseif sym.hunter.flags.degauss then sym.hunter.send('operate gaussify '..target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) elseif sym.hunter.flags.repeating then sym.hunter.send('gadget shock ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) elseif not sym.hunter.flags.harassed and not sym.hunter.flags.airdrop then sym.hunter.send('bot harass '..target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) elseif canmend then checkSystems() else sym.hunter.send('bot disrupt ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) end else sym.hunter.send('gadget shock ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) sym.hunter.flags.channeling = false end

Alias.name: musc route
Alias.script: local target = sym.target local sym_name = gmcp.Char.Name.name if not sym.hunter.flags.channeling then if not sym.hunter.flags.stimjected and not sym.hunter.flags.autoheal and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 75 then sym.hunter.send('stimjector ' .. sym_name) elseif not sym.hunter.flags.stimjected and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 55 then sym.hunter.send('stimjector ' .. sym_name) sym.hunter.flags.autoheal = false elseif not sym.hunter.flags.turretpower then sym.hunter.send('turret qpcboost') elseif tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.pt) < 36 and not sym.hunter.flags.airdrop then send('airdrop') elseif not sym.hunter.flags.harassed and not sym.hunter.flags.airdrop then sym.hunter.send('bot harass '..target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) elseif canmend then checkSystems() elseif current_shards > 5 then sym.hunter.send('operate magnetize ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) elseif not sym.hunter.flags.spike then sym.hunter.send('bot spike ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) else sym.hunter.send('operate junkjet ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess ' .. target) end else sym.hunter.send('gadget shock ' .. target) sym.hunter.flags.channeling = false end

Alias.name: Highlight QPC
Alias.script: -- code curtesy of Thorne local roomID = getPlayerRoom() if matches[2] then unHighlightRoom(roomID) else highlightRoom(roomID, 0, 255, 0, 0, 0, 255, 1, 255, 255) end local nearbyRooms = {} nearbyRooms[1] = {} nearbyRooms[2] = {} nearbyRooms[3] = {} for exit, room in pairs(getRoomExits(roomID)) do nearbyRooms[1][room] = true end for roomID, _ in pairs(nearbyRooms[1]) do for exit, room in pairs(getRoomExits(roomID)) do nearbyRooms[2][room] = true end end for roomID, _ in pairs(nearbyRooms[2]) do for exit, room in pairs(getRoomExits(roomID)) do nearbyRooms[3][room] = true end end local roomsInRadius = {} for _, roomlist in ipairs(nearbyRooms) do for roomID, _ in pairs(roomlist) do roomsInRadius[roomID] = true end end display(roomsInRadius) for roomID, _ in pairs(roomsInRadius) do if matches[2] then unHighlightRoom(roomID) else highlightRoom(roomID, 100, 100, 0, 100, 0, 150, 1, 255, 255) end end

Alias.name: frenzy
Alias.script: if tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.sa) >= 350 and not sym.hunter.flags.frenzy and not sym.hunter.flags.frenzyCD then send('oblivion frenzy') end

Alias.name: mind route
Alias.script:
local target = sym.target if not sym.hunter.flags.embraced and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 80 and not sym.hunter.flags.channeling then sym.hunter.send('void embrace') elseif canmend then checkSystems() elseif tonumber(sym.hunter.flags.mindaff) > 5 then sym.hunter.send('void minddrain ' .. target) elseif sym.hunter.flags.rattle then sym.hunter.send('nano confound ' .. target)
elseif sym.hunter.flags.sluggish then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('void rattle ' .. target)
elseif sym.hunter.flags.distracted then sym.hunter.send('CLEARQUEUE') sym.hunter.send('nano sluggish ' .. target) elseif tonumber(sym.hunter.flags.mindaff) > 3 then sym.hunter.send('nano distract ' .. target)
elseif not sym.hunter.flags.mindswap then sym.hunter.send('nano mindswap ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess')
elseif sym.hunter.flags.mindswap then sym.hunter.send('nano confound ' .. target) sym.hunter.send('assess')
else sym.hunter.send('eyestrike') sym.hunter.flags.channeling = false end

Alias.name: nano defences
Alias.script: if not sym.hunter.flags.architect and not sym.hunter.flags.conqueror then sym.hunter.send('oblivion channel architect') sym.hunter.flags.architect = true elseif sym.hunter.flags.architect and not sym.hunter.flags.miniaturization then sym.hunter.send('nano miniaturization') elseif sym.hunter.flags.architect and sym.hunter.flags.miniaturization and not sym.hunter.flags.protect then sym.hunter.send('nano protect') elseif sym.hunter.flags.architect and sym.hunter.flags.miniaturization and sym.hunter.flags.protect and not sym.hunter.flags.rush then sym.hunter.send('nano rush') elseif sym.hunter.flags.architect and sym.hunter.flags.miniaturization and sym.hunter.flags.protect and sym.hunter.flags.rush and not sym.hunter.flags.alertness then sym.hunter.send('nano alertness') elseif sym.hunter.flags.architect and sym.hunter.flags.miniaturization and sym.hunter.flags.protect and sym.hunter.flags.rush and sym.hunter.flags.alertness then sym.hunter.send('oblivion swap traveller') sym.hunter.flags.architect = false sym.hunter.send('oblivion affinity conqueror') elseif not sym.hunter.flags.architect and sym.hunter.flags.miniaturization and sym.hunter.flags.protect and sym.hunter.flags.rush and sym.hunter.flags.alertness and sym.hunter.flags.conqueror and not sym.hunter.flags.progenitor then sym.hunter.send('oblivion affinity progenitor') else sym.hunter.send('oblivion negation') echo('DEFUP COMPLETE - DONT FORGET PROGENITOR') end

Alias.name: damage route
Alias.script: local target = sym.target if not sym.hunter.flags.embraced and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 78 and not sym.hunter.flags.channeling then sym.hunter.send('void embrace') elseif canmend then checkSystems() elseif not sym.hunter.flags.roomdrain and windupcheck == 0 then expandAlias('frenzy') sym.hunter.send('void roomdrain') sym.hunter.send('assess') elseif not sym.hunter.flags.frozen and sym.haveskill('Freeze', 'Voidism') and windupcheck == 0 then expandAlias('frenzy') sym.hunter.send('void freeze '..target) sym.hunter.send('assess') else sym.hunter.send('eyestrike') sym.hunter.flags.channeling = false end

Alias.name: defup
Alias.script: sym.hunter.send('oblivion channel architect') tempTimer(3, [[sym.hunter.send('nano miniaturization')]]) tempTimer(7, [[sym.hunter.send('nano protect')]]) tempTimer(11, [[sym.hunter.send('nano rush')]]) tempTimer(14.5, [[sym.hunter.send('nano alertness')]]) tempTimer(18, [[sym.hunter.send('oblivion swap traveller')]]) tempTimer(18, [[sym.hunter.send('oblivion affinity conqueror')]]) tempTimer(21.5, [[sym.hunter.send('oblivion affinity progenitor')]]) tempTimer(24, [[sym.hunter.send('oblivion negation')]])

Alias.name: mind damage route
Alias.script: local target = sym.target if not sym.hunter.flags.embraced and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 78 and not sym.hunter.flags.channeling then sym.hunter.send('void embrace') elseif canmend then checkSystems() elseif not sym.hunter.flags.affinitied and tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.nn) > 150 then expandAlias('frenzy') sym.hunter.send('nano affinity '..target) sym.hunter.send('assess') elseif sym.hunter.flags.affinitied and not sym.hunter.flags.multistrike then expandAlias('frenzy') sym.hunter.send('nano multistrike '.. target) sym.hunter.send('assess') elseif sym.hunter.flags.affinitied and sym.hunter.flags.multistrike then expandAlias('frenzy') sym.hunter.send('nano swarm '.. target) sym.hunter.send('assess') else sym.hunter.send('freeze') sym.hunter.flags.channeling = false end

Alias.name: bleed1
Alias.script: local target = sym.target local stance = gmcp.Char.Vitals.st:lower() local rage = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.rg) if not sym.hunter.flags.channeling then if not sym.hunter.flags.suffused and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 71 then sym.hunter.send("suffuse") elseif canmend and not sym.hunter.flags.unstoppable then checkSystems() else if sym.hunter.flags.unstoppable then local to_combo = { ['symmetry'] = 'combo gutrend overwhelm', ['flare'] = 'combo wound overwhelm', ['eruption'] = 'combo hypertension overwhelm', } sym.hunter.send(to_combo[stance] .. ' ' .. target) else if sym.hunter.flags.unstoppableready then local to_combo = { ['symmetry'] = 'combo gutrend unstoppable', ['flare'] = 'combo wound unstoppable', ['eruption'] = 'combo hypertension unstoppable', } sym.hunter.send(to_combo[stance] .. ' ' .. target) else if not sym.hunter.flags.berserk and rage >= 5 then local to_combo = { ['symmetry'] = 'combo gutrend berserk', ['flare'] = 'combo wound deepstrike', ['eruption'] = 'combo hypertension berserk', } sym.hunter.send(to_combo[stance] .. ' ' .. target) else local to_combo = { ['symmetry'] = 'combo gutrend flyinglash', ['flare'] = 'combo wound deepstrike', ['eruption'] = 'combo hypertension flyinglash', } sym.hunter.send(to_combo[stance] .. ' ' .. target) end end end end else sym.hunter.send("fever") sym.hunter.flags.channeling = false end

Alias.name: bleed2damage
Alias.script: local target = sym.target local stance = gmcp.Char.Vitals.st:lower() local rage = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.rg) if not sym.hunter.flags.channeling then if not sym.hunter.flags.suffused and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 75 then sym.hunter.send("suffuse") elseif sym.hunter.flags.unstoppable == true and sym.hunter.flags.overpower == false then local to_combo = { ['symmetry'] = 'combo gutrend overpower', ['flare'] = 'combo wound overpower', ['eruption'] = 'combo bloodburn overpower', } sym.hunter.send(to_combo[stance] .. ' ' .. target) else if sym.hunter.flags.unstoppable == true then local to_combo = { ['symmetry'] = 'combo gutrend slice', ['flare'] = 'combo wound slice', ['eruption'] = 'combo bloodsinge slice', } sym.hunter.send(to_combo[stance] .. ' ' .. target) elseif canmend then checkSystems() else if sym.hunter.flags.unstoppableready == true then local to_combo = { ['symmetry'] = 'combo gutrend unstoppable', ['flare'] = 'combo wound unstoppable', ['eruption'] = 'combo hypertension unstoppable', } sym.hunter.send(to_combo[stance] .. ' ' .. target) else if not sym.hunter.flags.berserk and rage > 10 then local to_combo = { ['symmetry'] = 'combo gutrend berserk', ['flare'] = 'combo wound deepstrike', ['eruption'] = 'combo rupture berserk', } sym.hunter.send(to_combo[stance] .. ' ' .. target) else local to_combo = { ['symmetry'] = 'combo gutrend flyinglash', ['flare'] = 'combo wound deepstrike', ['eruption'] = 'combo rupture flyinglash', } sym.hunter.send(to_combo[stance] .. ' ' .. target) end end end end else sym.hunter.send("fever") sym.hunter.flags.channeling = false end

Alias.name: musc1
Alias.script: local target = sym.target local stance = gmcp.Char.Vitals.st:lower() local rage = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.rg) if not sym.hunter.flags.channeling then if not sym.hunter.flags.suffused and ((gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) < 75 then sym.hunter.send("suffuse") elseif canmend and not sym.hunter.flags.unstoppable then checkSystems() else if sym.hunter.flags.unstoppable then local to_combo = { ['symmetry'] = 'combo swiftcut overwhelm', ['ember'] = 'combo assail overwhelm', ['blaze'] = 'combo barrage overwhelm', } sym.hunter.send(to_combo[stance] .. ' ' .. target) else if sym.hunter.flags.unstoppableready then local to_combo = { ['symmetry'] = 'combo swiftcut unstoppable', ['ember'] = 'combo assail unstoppable', ['blaze'] = 'combo barrage unstoppable', } sym.hunter.send(to_combo[stance] .. ' ' .. target) else if not sym.hunter.flags.resistant and rage > 10 then local to_combo = { ['symmetry'] = 'combo swiftcut resistant', ['ember'] = 'combo assail rend', ['blaze'] = 'combo barrage resistant', } sym.hunter.send(to_combo[stance] .. ' ' .. target) else local to_combo = { ['symmetry'] = 'combo swiftcut upperlash', ['ember'] = 'combo assail rend', ['blaze'] = 'combo barrage upperlash', } sym.hunter.send(to_combo[stance] .. ' ' .. target) end end end end else sym.hunter.send("fever") sym.hunter.flags.channeling = false end

Alias.name: reload ui
Alias.script:
function sym.ui.reload(event, package) if sym.loadtimer then killTimer(sym.loadtimer) end sym.loadtimer = tempTimer( 0, function() sym.ui.update_stylesheet() -- sym.ui.set_borders() sym.ui.create_background() sym.ui.create_boxes() sym.ui.create_modules() sym.ui.adj.top:show() sym.ui.adj.bottom:show() sym.ui.adj.topright:show() sym.ui.adj.bottomright:show() sym.ui.adj.topleft:show() sym.ui.adj.bottomleft:show() sym.space.boarded = false capacitor_bf = "No" engine_bf = "No" sensor_bf = "No" shield_bf = "No" sim_bf = "No" if sym.ui.chat.use then sym.ui.chat:create() end if sym.ui.mapper.use then sym.ui.mapper:create() end if sym.ui.info.use then sym.ui.info:create() end raiseEvent('sym.ui.loaded') end ) end
sym.registerevent('ui installed', 'sysInstall', 'sym.ui.reload', 'sysLuaInstallModule') sym.registerevent('ui loaded', 'sysLoadEvent', 'sym.ui.reload', 'sysLuaInstallModule')
